basics.name: Toyin Ayanleye
basics.label: Security Enthusiast
basics.summary: I am a young professional skilled in Web Application Security, Android Application Security, Cloud Architecture & Security and Scripting. I am currently working on Web Security Automation (being sponsored by AWS), Bug Bounties, Vulnerability Disclosure Programs and open-source Web Application code review. Constantly learning and improving myself with my RSS Feeds and reading. Check out my resume
